name: Optimum Consumable
description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Consumable
Optimal Charge Window Size: +75%
Instability: +10%
Heat Generation: +10%
Signature Size: +20%
Duration: 20 seconds
Charges: 5
The Optimum makes mining safer by increasing the optimal charge window for 20 seconds. This allows the laser to pump a deposit with more power before it crosses into the catastrophic danger pool.
description_cn:
制造商：灰猫工业(Greycat Industrial)
物品类型：矿枪耗材
充能绿区：+75%
不稳定性：+10%
热量产生：+10%
信号大小：+20%
生效时间：20秒
使用次数：5
最佳耗材通过增大20秒绿色充能区间增加采矿安全性.这将允许采矿激光在不使矿石爆裂的前提下注入更多能量.
